HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content:
Call of Duty: Zombies Pack has been updated to Version 1.6 |Changes: Updated To rimworld Version 1.5 Updated Textures for Vanilla Pack a Punch weapons! Some weapons have multiple different skins! Halituis's retexture mod if installed will give Extra skins! Un hardcoded Athena Framework. You can remove it But i highly recommend still using Athena it as.
Removing Athena will remove Double Tap 2, Weapon Beams visuals and Angular Shotguns.
